columns.Country_id: A unique identifier for each country in the table.
columns.Capital: The capital city of the country.
columns.Official_native_language: The language that is officially recognized and spoken in the country.

country.table_description: The country table holds essential information about countries, including their unique IDs, names, capitals, and official languages.

columns.Team_id: A unique identifier for each team in the database.
columns.Name: The name of the team as recognized in competitions.

team.table_description: The team table stores information about various sports teams, each identified by a unique ID and accompanied by their respective names.

columns.Season: Represents the specific year of the match season.
columns.Player: The name of the player associated with the match season.
columns.Position: Indicates the playing position of the player.
columns.Country: Refers to the country code representing the player's nationality.
columns.Team: Identifies the team code to which the player belongs during the match season.
columns.Draft_Pick_Number: Denotes the player's selection number during the draft process.
columns.Draft_Class: Specifies the draft year and event associated with the player's selection.
columns.College: Captures the name of the college or university the player attended before being drafted.

match_season.table_description: The match_season table catalogs player information for various match seasons, including their names, positions, nationalities, team affiliations, draft details, and educational backgrounds.

columns.Player_ID: A unique identifier for each player.
columns.Player: The name of the player, including any associated identifiers.
columns.Years_Played: The years during which the player has participated in matches, represented in a specific time range format.
columns.Total_WL: Total wins and losses for the player across all matches played.
columns.Singles_WL: Wins and losses specifically for singles matches played by the player.
columns.Doubles_WL: Wins and losses specifically for doubles matches played by the player.
columns.Team: The identifier for the team that the player is part of.

player.table_description: The player table contains detailed information about individual players, including their performance metrics, participation duration, and team affiliation.
